org.anarres.simplexml.factory

Class PersisterFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.anarres.simplexml.factory.PersisterFactory

  • public class PersisterFactory
extends Object
    The main factory class for a Persister. To use this project:
    1. Create a PersisterFactory
    2. Add ConverterFactories and TransformFactories to it.
    3. Call newPersister()
    Various shortcuts for this process are provided in the case that you are using ServiceLoader, Spring Framework or other component discovery mechanisms.
